overview: The strongest 8BEAT that carries the best masterpiece and plays with the bond with the fans. A package of the long-awaited spectator live performance for the first time in about 1 year and 9 months! It has been about 1 year and 9 months since the 47 prefecture tour was suspended. Kanjani8 has been working under the theme of "Road to Re:LIVE" for the live event. From his first arena tour in about 5 years in support of his original album "8BEAT" in 4 and a half years, Yokohama Arena performances for the first time in 13 years are visualized!
title: Road to Re:LIVE 8BEAT
